root.para: All derivatives transactions are executed through a centralized group of traders that reports to the CFO. The traders and CFO are very knowledgeable about derivatives. There is a formal risk management process for derivatives. Austin-Jhanes has systems in place to monitor the risks being hedged, as well as the ongoing effectiveness of the hedges. The trading desk executes derivatives transactions only with counterparties that have been approved after careful assessment of creditworthiness. There are limits on the credit exposure to any one counterparty and the extent to which derivatives can be used to hedge a given exposure.
